I met my current wife on this game, and even though she was obese, I'm still glad that we crossed paths. She is the love of my life, especially the bits that stick out. I would 100% recommend this game and suggest you to the csgo reddit page! I met my gay best friend on that platform. His name is Seb and make sure you say hi to him if you encounter him in r/niceguys.
